articles.author: Marek Brave
articles.title: The Draft Network grades Miami Dolphins 2023 NFL Draft class tops among AFC East teams - The Phinsider
articles.description: Dolphins beat out New England, New York and Buffalo for highest grade for 2023 NFL Draft class in AFC East
articles.content: The Draft Network released their grades for all NFL teams from the 2023 NFL Draft on Twitter Monday night, and when it came to ranking the drafts from all AFC East teams, the Miami Dolphins graded ou… [+962 chars]
